metadata.synopsis: Dialogue between the players and Roger Highberry in the Serial Killer situation. This dialog will be used while de Wine Festival and if Cora dies.
metadata.how_to_trigger: When making click on Roger Highberry and Cora is dead (by the hand of the player or in the battle with Dolor).Coordinates: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-1744.392090;41.463974;639.926086&camTarget=-1745.265991;41.178829;639.532410Relevant flags in this page: https://larianstudios.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GUS/pages/2624159852/Lower+City+Debug+Commands

0.speaker: Roger Highberry
0.text: How could someone... do such a thing?
0.context: NodeContext: his wife has just died

1.speaker: Roger Highberry
1.text: Please, leave me to my memories, if you wouldn't mind.

2.speaker: Roger Highberry
2.text: Cora would've loved this. Everyone so cheery, the charmed weather... Gods...
2.context: NodeContext: Roger speaks in wistful, sad tones about Cora

3.speaker: Roger Highberry
3.context: NodeContext: his wife has just died

4.speaker: Roger Highberry
4.text: Th - thank you for saving me from that terrible man.

5.speaker: Roger Highberry
5.text: I just wish Cora could've been saved too...

6.speaker: Roger Highberry
6.text: Please, leave me to my memories, if you wouldn't mind.
